Trade/Device Name(s): Puritan Amies Medium Collection and Transport System
Regulation Name(s): Microbiological specimen collection and transport device
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Puritan Amies Medium Collection and Transport System for collection and transport of clinical specimens containing bacteria for laboratory examination and culture.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use in the collection and transport of clinical specimens containing aerobic, anaerobic, and fastidious bacteria from the patient to the laboratory for bacteriological examination and culture.
